nodes.text: Geonosian Debriefings, Vol. III, was a collection of debriefings belonging to the Galactic Republic on the topic of the First Battle of Geonosis, the battle that started the Clone Wars, a conflict between the Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. This collection included a debriefing from clone trooper CT-1226, on his experience during the battle.
The debriefings were first mentioned in The Essential Guide to Warfare, an extensive guide dedicated to the conflicts in the galaxy, written by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart and released in 2012.
